originalText.text: I havenâ€™t had a hair cut in 1.5 years so my hair was ridiculously long and dead. I read the google reviews and saw how much everyone loves Onur Salon so I booked for myself! I had the BEST time!!!!!! Joseph cut and blow dried my hair and he was amazing, so detailed and attentive. It looks perfect and I will 10000% be returning for all my haircuts. THANK YOU

originalText.text:
I had the pleasure of getting a balayage and blow dry from Onur recently and wanted to follow up with a review because heâ€™s a very talented hair stylist & great business owner. I couldn't be happier with the results. I have been coming to him for over a year now & I try to book him whenever Iâ€™m in New York.

His expertise in balayage truly brought out natural, beautiful highlights that seamlessly blended with my hair. The precision and attention to detail during the process were impressive.

Not only did he masterfully execute the balayage, but the blow dry that followed was done exactly as I asked for. My hair looked and felt incredible, with a perfect balance of volume and smoothness.
Onurâ€™s passion for his craft is evident, and it reflects in the outstanding quality of his work. I know all his other clients feel the same way.

Beyond the technical skill, the overall experience was really pleasant. He is super attentive, and ensured I felt comfortable throughout the appointment. As a fellow local business owner, we have a lot to chat about & I always look forward to our exchanges about running a business in the Big Apple on the Upper East Side.

If you're looking for a hair stylist who excels in balayage and blow dry techniques, I wholeheartedly recommend this wonderful place. Iâ€™ve also experienced visits with Onurâ€™s staff, all of whom are kind, professional and attentive. Onur clearly trains everyone very well with care and love. I can see his staff enjoy working with him.

I'll definitely be returning for more transformations!

originalText.text: Had my hair done today with Onur and it was a great experience. He really catered to my every desire when in regards to my hair and itâ€™s the first time I leave a salon truly 100% happy with the result. Will definitely come again and would recommend to anyone. FYI I have curly 4c hair and he really took great care of it so definitely curly hair friendly!

originalText.text: Got my hair done here about 2 weeks ago. I am so happy with the results! I came in with one length hair with about 3 different colors showing up due to multiple box dye attempts. Onur listened to what I wanted and provided realistic solution to get me the desired look with minimal hair damage. I came in wanting a one tone chocolate brown color and left with a chocolate brown bayalage that exceeded my expectations. In addition, he has many skilled assistants that help save time and make you feel like a celebrity. Iâ€™m sure Iâ€™ll be back and recommend others!
